properties.name: additionalData
properties.description: Custom additional data that was sent with the notification. Set on the dashboard under Options > Additional Dataor with the 'data' field on the REST API.

properties.name: smallIcon
properties.description: **ANDROID** - Small icon resource name set on the notification.

properties.name: largeIcon
properties.description: **ANDROID** - Large icon set on the notification.

properties.name: bigPicture
properties.description: **ANDROID** - Big picture image set on the notification.

properties.name: smallIconAccentColor
properties.description: **ANDROID** - Accent color shown around small notification icon on Android 5+ devices. ARGB format.

properties.name: launchUrl
properties.description: URL to open when opening the notification.

properties.name: sound
properties.description: Sound resource to play when the notification is shown.

properties.name: ledColor
properties.description: **ANDROID** - Devices that have a notification LED will blink in this color. ARGB format.

properties.name: groupKey
properties.description: **ANDROID** - Notifications with this same key will be grouped together as a single summary notification.

properties.name: groupMessage
properties.description: **ANDROID** - Summary text displayed in the summary notification.

properties.name: actionButtons
properties.description: List of action buttons on the notification.

properties.name: fromProjectNumber
properties.description: **ANDROID** - The Google project number the notification was sent under.

properties.name: backgroundImageLayout
properties.description: **ANDROID** - If a background image was set this object will be available.

properties.name: rawPayload
properties.description: List of action buttons on the notification.
